src:
Statistik Laga Lokomotiv Moscow vs Juventus: Si Bianconeri Masuk dalam 'Klub 300'
07 Nov 2019, 08:10 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Juventus berhasil menuai kemenangan dalam matchday ke-4 fase grup Liga Champions pada Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari tadi. Melawat ke markas Lokomotiv Moscow, skuat besutan Maurizio Sarri tersebut menang dengan skor tipis 2-1.
Klub berjuluk Bianconeri itu mencetak gol pertamanya pada menit ke-3 melalui sontekan Aaron Ramsey. Beberapa menit berselang, Lokomotiv Moscow sukses membalas melalui tendangan Aleksei Miranchuk.
Pada masa injury time, Douglas Costa melakukan aksi solo run yang berujung pada gol kemenangan Juventus. Dengan hasil ini, Juventus mendapatkan tiket untuk melaju ke babak 16 besar Liga Champions musim 2019/20.
Pertandingan seru kali ini juga menyajikan beberapa catatan penting yang wajib untuk diketahui. Salah satunya adalah Juventus yang kini masuk dalam 'klub 300'. Informasi lengkap yang disadur dari BBC Sport bisa disimak dengan melakukan scroll ke bawah.
text:
Moscow vs Juventus Lokomotiv Match Statistics: The Bianconeri Enter 'Club 300'
Nov 7 2019, 08:10 by Bola.net
Soccer - Juventus managed to reap victory in Matchday 4 phase of the Champions League group on Thursday (11/07/2019) early this morning. Visiting the Lokomotiv Moscow headquarters, the squad made by Maurizio Sarri won with a thin score of 2-1.
The club nicknamed the Bianconeri scored its first goal in the 3rd minute through Aaron Ramsey. A few minutes later, Lokomotiv Moscow successfully responded by kicking Aleksei Miranchuk.
During injury time, Douglas Costa carried out a solo run that led to Juventus winning goal. With this result, Juventus get a ticket to advance to the last 16 of the 2019/20 Champions League season.
This exciting game also presents several important notes that must be known. One of them is Juventus who are now included in the 'club 300'. Detailed information adapted from BBC Sport can be listened to by scrolling down.
